briefdescription.para: Returns the digital configuration of the specified neuron.

simplesect.para: To prevent misconfiguration, enabling the external current input and external voltage output switches is only possible on the Chip level. Consequently the corresponding bits of the returned configuration container are always disabled.

briefdescription.para: Changes the digital configuration of the specified neuron.

simplesect.para: The state of the external current input and external voltage output switches is solely controlled through enable_buffered_readout(). Corresponding settings of the passed-in configuration have no effect on the stored instance.
